name: .NET Development with SQL Server
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'curl -sSL https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh | bash /dev/stdin --channel 10.0 --install-dir /usr/share/dotnet && sudo rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io docker-compose && dotnet restore BlazorApp02/BlazorApp02.sln'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'sleep 40 && CONTAINER_ID=$(sudo docker ps --filter name=db --format "{{.ID}}" | head -1) && [ -n "$CONTAINER_ID" ] && sudo docker exec $CONTAINER_ID bash /usr/local/bin/init-db.sh 2>/dev/null || echo "DB initialization skipped"'
